Text: Please be sure to seed, I'm not going to let this go forever, after a couple days I'm going to delete the original file and will no longer seed.
Hey does it work on intel mac as well?
It does not work on Intel macs. It only work on Classic, so no OSX support at all, would love to be able to play this, but its a no-go.
It'll only work on a PPC Mac. There's a way to emulate a PPC Mac with Sheepshaver, but the effort simply isn't worth it.
